welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bamukumbit, the charming city known for its vibrant culture and warm hospitality. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bamenda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
